“Since I’ve been attending Spark, I feel less anxious and a little more confident with my education.”

Young person, age 15

An Alternative Provision dedicated to improving the life chances of children and young people

SPARK is an Alternative Provision that is dedicated to improving the life chances for children and young people. It is vital to us that children and young people feel valued and understood, we believe this supports their personal growth and positive change.

With an increasing amount of pressure on schools to not only teach our children but to manage and support their behavioural, personal, social, emotional and psychological needs, we are in a climate where exclusion, isolation and poor mental health is at an all time high.

Therapeutic environment

SPARK offers a therapeutic environment that promotes physical, social and psychological safety. Using a nurturing approach, we establish positive relationships with children and young people and work together to minimise and overcome barriers that prevent them from learning and enjoying their educational experience.

Holistic programmes

Our programmes are holistic and put the young person at the centre of their own development. We provide care and challenge in equal measures, ensuring a predictable, reliable structure and high expectations whilst maintaining a focus on achievement.

Bespoke & innovative curriculum

At SPARK we engage children and young people by offering a bespoke and innovative curriculum, we encourage a passion for learning and we empower children to believe that their strengths can flourish, enabling self-belief, confidence and resilience. We believe that no child should be left behind and that all children and young people should have many chances to succeed.
